mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT from_station,from_station_name,to_station,to_station_name FROM tb_query_history WHERE uid = #{uid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_query_history ( uid, from_station, to_station, from_station_name, to_station_name ) VALUES ( #{uid}, #{from_station}, #{to_station}, #{from_station_name}, #{to_station_name} )
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_query_history SET uid = #{uid}, from_station = #{from_station}, to_station = #{to_station}, from_station_name = #{from_station_name}, to_station_name = #{to_station_name}, update_time = #{update_time} WHERE id = #{id}
